reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater gorgeous. However, the size receives mixed feedback, with one customer noting it runs very oversized.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This make me feel fashionable and comfortable
items.body: Great style, very comfortable, loose fit but it is made to be this way. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars A heavy-ish sweater that runs large, but is very cute
items.body: So for the most part I love, love, love this sweater. It's big and comfortable. When I say big I mean BIG. I got a small and I was swimming in it. Honestly if they had an x-small I feel I'd still be swimming in it... and I'm not rail thin either. I took some pictures of the sweater for comparison. The pink t-shirt is a size medium and the black and white striped sweater is also a medium. Both of these other tops are a relaxed fit on me and outside of the arms of the striped sweater neither top is tight in any way. This sweater is so comfortable though. The material is extremely soft and for the most part it's made really well. The only thing I don't like is that at one of the shoulders (just my right side) the sweater knit kind of has a point to it whereas the other side its natural (I tried to include a picture). For the most part you don't notice it, but if you really look at it then you'd see it. The ribbon also isn't quite what it looks like on the picture. The listing picture shows a more matte non-shiny ribbon and honestly goes a bit better with the sweater. What I got was a shiny ribbon that doesn't look as high of quality as the listing picture. I don't mind it so much, but it is a noticeable difference. You definitely need the ribbon there because even with it tied relatively tight the sweater still turns into somewhat of an off the shoulder sweater. Like I said before it's big which means that the sweater is loose. This sweater is also heavy. It's heavy in the sense that yes it should keep you warm. It's not crazy thick, but it does feel thick enough that I could see me wearing this over another shirt in the winter. I don't see me being able to really wear this under anything. Maaaaybe you could get away with wearing a large jacket over this, but everything is very thick and loose that I feel it would be uncomfortable to wear something over this... under yes, but over not really. The sweater is also heavy in the sense that it is just heavy overall. I actually love that about this. It makes it feel very well made and like it's more expensive than it is. It does need to probably be tucked in to some pants or something to make it a tad more form fitting. It's completely loose at the bottom - there's no tightness to it at all. The V in the front does dip, but the tie in the back is really going to determine how much cleavage and shoulder are showing. Overall, I am very happy with this and I'm very happy with the black color that I got. Read more
items.author: Reader

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous but definitely downsize
items.body: Absolutely gorgeous but very over sized recommend going down a size but other then that no complaints Read more
items.author: CatForrest

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Non flattering sweatshirt
items.body: I like the fact that the sweater is a V-neck in both the front and in the back. The tie in the back is a nice touch. The material of the sweater is nice and silky feeling. The sweater doesn’t give much shape and is not flattering. Read more
items.author: Shawn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really cute and worth the $$$
items.body: Wearing it right now for XMAS Eve and wore it with a deep cranberry skirt for my work Holiday get together. I have received a bunch of compliments on this sweater. The sweater is weighty, comfy, soft and stylish. It looks cutest tucked in. It is oversized so you might be able to size down if you like things more fitted. I am a small so couldn't get any smaller, but I am happy of it's tucked. It flows out and looks great with a more fitted bottom. Read more
items.author: TP1

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Super short
items.body: Super short and not flattering Read more
items.author: Ckal2514

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars UARK game
items.body: So cute and warm. And….mom appropriate too! Read more
items.author: Megan Burch

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cozy and Feminine!
items.body: This sweater is really cute! The bow-tied back detail makes it so chic and unique, while the lantern sleeves give it that trendy, elegant effortless touch. The material is weighty giving it a quality feel, but soft, warm, and perfect for fall and winter—cozy without being bulky. I feel that the weight of the garment allows it to hang just right. It’s the perfect length and can be worn tucked in or out with jeans, leggings, jeggings, skirts or even over dresses. It fits true to size and drapes beautifully, flattering without clinging. The neckline is very flattering and allows for plenty of room for jewelry. This sweater can be dressed up or down and is giving winter and Christmas party ready. I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because the bow in the picture is much more tailored and structured than in reality. The bow, although flattering, just hangs and looks a bit limp. I’m not sure I will be able to starch it to my liking since it’s such a silky material. I’m almost tempted to swap the material for a thinker more rigid one. Overall, If you want something that’s both comfortable and stylish with a little sexy flair, this sweater is a must-have! It’s a great value for the price. Read more
items.author: MoLesaDione

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dress Black, Light Coffee, Burgundy, Black, Dress Burgundy, Dress Beige, Dark Green, Navy, Beige, Stripes White, Dress Coffee, Stripes Beige, Dress Navy. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
